questions.question: 1) What is the Supreme Law of the Land?

8) What did the Declaration of Independence do?

choices.answer: said that the US is free

questions.question: 9) What are two rights in the Declaration of Independence?

choices.answer: Life and the Pursuit of Happiness

questions.question: 10) What is freedom of religion?
11) What is the economic system in the United States?(2 answers are correct)
12) What is the “rule of law”?

choices.answer: No one is above the law

choices.answer: To trade for Silk and Spices

choices.answer: Alexander Hamilton. John Jay & James Madison

questions.question: 68) What is Benjamin Franklin famous for?

choices.answer: Represented New York at Constitutional Convention
Wrote "Poor Richard's Almanac" & Oldest Member of the Const. Convention
